function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor air quality and increased risk of virus transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of airborne virus transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increased fresh air supply, use of HEPA filters, and control of indoor humidity and temperature","Technologies":"Demand-controlled ventilation systems, HEPA filters, air quality sensors","People":"Occupants of workplaces","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate distancing and building layout leading to crowded and poorly designed spaces","Impact":"Higher risk of close contact and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Installation of physical barriers, varied and open office spaces, and allocation of individual spaces","Technologies":"Plexiglass barriers, space planning software, occupancy sensors","People":"Occupants of workplaces","Owner":"Architects, interior designers"},{"Description":"Use of high-touch surfaces and equipment increasing the risk of surface transmission of viruses","Impact":"Higher risk of surface transmission and contamination leading to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Integration of touch-free technology, selection of virus-resistant materials for surfaces","Technologies":"Touch-free devices, automated infrared temperature checks, virus-resistant materials","People":"Occupants of workplaces","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
